ayahs.ar: قُلۡ أُوحِيَ إِلَيَّ أَنَّهُ ٱسۡتَمَعَ نَفَرٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ فَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا سَمِعۡنَا قُرۡءَانًا عَجَبٗا
ayahs.en: Say, [O Muhammad], "It has been revealed to me that a group of the jinn listened and said, 'Indeed, we have heard an amazing Qur'an

ayahs.ar: يَهۡدِيٓ إِلَى ٱلرُّشۡدِ فَـَٔامَنَّا بِهِۦۖ وَلَن نُّشۡرِكَ بِرَبِّنَآ أَحَدٗا
ayahs.en: It guides to the right course, and we have believed in it. And we will never associate with our Lord anyone

ayahs.ar: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَٰحِبَةٗ وَلَا وَلَدٗا
ayahs.en: And [it teaches] that exalted is the nobleness of our Lord; He has not taken a wife or a son

ayahs.ar: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ شَطَطٗا
ayahs.en: And that our foolish one has been saying about Allah an excessive transgression

ayahs.ar: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن تَقُولَ ٱلۡإِنسُ وَٱلۡجِنُّ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبٗا
ayahs.en: And we had thought that mankind and the jinn would never speak about Allah a lie

ayahs.ar: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ رِجَالٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡإِنسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمۡ رَهَقٗا
ayahs.en: And there were men from mankind who sought refuge in men from the jinn, so they [only] increased them in burden

ayahs.ar: وَأَنَّهُمۡ ظَنُّواْ كَمَا ظَنَنتُمۡ أَن لَّن يَبۡعَثَ ٱللَّهُ أَحَدٗا
ayahs.en: And they had thought, as you thought, that Allah would never send anyone [as a messenger]

ayahs.ar: وَأَنَّا لَمَسۡنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ فَوَجَدۡنَٰهَا مُلِئَتۡ حَرَسٗا شَدِيدٗا وَشُهُبٗا
ayahs.en: And we have sought [to reach] the heaven but found it filled with powerful guards and burning flames

ayahs.ar: وَأَنَّا كُنَّا نَقۡعُدُ مِنۡهَا مَقَٰعِدَ لِلسَّمۡعِۖ فَمَن يَسۡتَمِعِ ٱلۡأٓنَ يَجِدۡ لَهُۥ شِهَابٗا رَّصَدٗا
ayahs.en: And we used to sit therein in positions for hearing, but whoever listens now will find a burning flame lying in wait for him

ayahs.ar: وَأَنَّا لَا نَدۡرِيٓ أَشَرٌّ أُرِيدَ بِمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ أَمۡ أَرَادَ بِهِمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ رَشَدٗا
ayahs.en: And we do not know [therefore] whether evil is intended for those on earth or whether their Lord intends for them a right course

ayahs.ar: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلصَّـٰلِحُونَ وَمِنَّا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَۖ كُنَّا طَرَآئِقَ قِدَدٗا
ayahs.en: And among us are the righteous, and among us are [others] not so; we were [of] divided ways

ayahs.ar: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن نُّعۡجِزَ ٱللَّهَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَن نُّعۡجِزَهُۥ هَرَبٗا
ayahs.en: And we have become certain that we will never cause failure to Allah upon earth, nor can we escape Him by flight

ayahs.ar: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعۡنَا ٱلۡهُدَىٰٓ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦۖ فَمَن يُؤۡمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخۡسٗا وَلَا رَهَقٗا
ayahs.en: And when we heard the guidance, we believed in it. And whoever believes in his Lord will not fear deprivation or burden

ayahs.ar: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلۡمُسۡلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا ٱلۡقَٰسِطُونَۖ فَمَنۡ أَسۡلَمَ فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ تَحَرَّوۡاْ رَشَدٗا
ayahs.en: And among us are Muslims [in submission to Allah], and among us are the unjust. And whoever has become Muslim - those have sought out the right course

ayahs.ar: وَأَمَّا ٱلۡقَٰسِطُونَ فَكَانُواْ لِجَهَنَّمَ حَطَبٗا
ayahs.en: But as for the unjust, they will be, for Hell, firewood

ayahs.ar: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسۡتَقَٰمُواْ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقٗا
ayahs.en: And [Allah revealed] that if they had remained straight on the way, We would have given them abundant provision

ayahs.ar: لِّنَفۡتِنَهُمۡ فِيهِۚ وَمَن يُعۡرِضۡ عَن ذِكۡرِ رَبِّهِۦ يَسۡلُكۡهُ عَذَابٗا صَعَدٗا
ayahs.en: So We might test them therein. And whoever turns away from the remembrance of his Lord He will put into arduous punishment

ayahs.ar: وَأَنَّ ٱلۡمَسَٰجِدَ لِلَّهِ فَلَا تَدۡعُواْ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٗا
ayahs.en: And [He revealed] that the masjids are for Allah, so do not invoke with Allah anyone

ayahs.ar: وَأَنَّهُۥ لَمَّا قَامَ عَبۡدُ ٱللَّهِ يَدۡعُوهُ كَادُواْ يَكُونُونَ عَلَيۡهِ لِبَدٗا
ayahs.en: And that when the Servant of Allah stood up supplicating Him, they almost became about him a compacted mass

ayahs.ar: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَدۡعُواْ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدٗا
ayahs.en: Say, [O Muhammad], "I only invoke my Lord and do not associate with Him anyone

ayahs.ar: قُلۡ إِنِّي لَآ أَمۡلِكُ لَكُمۡ ضَرّٗا وَلَا رَشَدٗا
ayahs.en: Say, "Indeed, I do not possess for you [the power of] harm or right direction

ayahs.ar: قُلۡ إِنِّي لَن يُجِيرَنِي مِنَ ٱللَّهِ أَحَدٞ وَلَنۡ أَجِدَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مُلۡتَحَدًا
ayahs.en: Say, "Indeed, there will never protect me from Allah anyone [if I should disobey], nor will I find in other than Him a refuge

ayahs.ar: إِلَّا بَلَٰغٗا مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَرِسَٰلَٰتِهِۦۚ وَمَن يَعۡصِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًا
ayahs.en: But [I have for you] only notification from Allah, and His messages." And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger - then indeed, for him is the fire of Hell; they will abide therein forever

ayahs.ar: حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا رَأَوۡاْ مَا يُوعَدُونَ فَسَيَعۡلَمُونَ مَنۡ أَضۡعَفُ نَاصِرٗا وَأَقَلُّ عَدَدٗا
ayahs.en: [The disbelievers continue] until, when they see that which they are promised, then they will know who is weaker in helpers and less in number

ayahs.ar: قُلۡ إِنۡ أَدۡرِيٓ أَقَرِيبٞ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ أَمۡ يَجۡعَلُ لَهُۥ رَبِّيٓ أَمَدًا
ayahs.en: Say, "I do not know if what you are promised is near or if my Lord will grant for it a [long] period

ayahs.ar: عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ فَلَا يُظۡهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيۡبِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا
ayahs.en: [He is] Knower of the unseen, and He does not disclose His [knowledge of the] unseen to anyone

ayahs.ar: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱرۡتَضَىٰ مِن رَّسُولٖ فَإِنَّهُۥ يَسۡلُكُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِ يَدَيۡهِ وَمِنۡ خَلۡفِهِۦ رَصَدٗا
ayahs.en: Except whom He has approved of messengers, and indeed, He sends before each messenger and behind him observers

ayahs.ar: لِّيَعۡلَمَ أَن قَدۡ أَبۡلَغُواْ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّهِمۡ وَأَحَاطَ بِمَا لَدَيۡهِمۡ وَأَحۡصَىٰ كُلَّ شَيۡءٍ عَدَدَۢا
ayahs.en: That he may know that they have conveyed the messages of their Lord; and He has encompassed whatever is with them and has enumerated all things in number
